chunk:
Naturium Hyaluronic Acid essence 2%

Brand: Naturium

Category: Serums & Essences

Ingredients: Water, Propanediol, Sodium Hyaluronate, Glycerin, Biosaccharide Gum-1, Beta-Glucan, Hydroxyacetophenone, Dipropylene Glycol, Phenoxyethanol, Xanthan Gum, Caprylyl Glycol, Acacia Senegal Gum, Algin, Benzoic Acid, Sorbic Acid, Sodium Hydroxide.

Directions: Directly after cleansing, shake bottle to dispense essence into hands. Press palms together before gently pressing onto face and neck. Pat essence into skin until fully absorbed. Use twice daily. Follow with serums and moisturizers.
Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; LOW: Cancer, Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
